content.name: Fleet Follow tweaks
content.description:
[b]This mod tweaks the order "Follow Commander" for fleets.[/b]
In vanilla, the "Follow Commander" order uses the same script as "Follow Ship" As a result, ships simply follow behind the commander without forming a formation.
With this mod, ships that "Follow Commander" will form a proper formation with the commander, allowing the fleet to collectively construct a combat box using turrets. Additionally, subordinate ships will not retaliate when attacked. Just like in vanilla, ships under the "Follow Commander" order will not use their main weapons.
I created this mod to form a combat box using gunships. However, I discovered that ships under the "Follow Commander" order tend to stop moving, making them easy targets for enemies.
[b]Acknowledgements:[/b] I would like to express my gratitude for gso25mm's great ideas, efforts, and kind permission to release.
